body_text: I think we should forgo making this lazy unless it's a big deal so that, if the pref changes, the next page load has the updated URL vs it being cached until next reboot, or some complex pref watching.
body: I think we should forgo making this lazy unless it's a big deal so that, if the pref changes, the next page load has the updated URL vs it being cached until next reboot, or some complex pref watching.
